1.0.1.name: wordpress/post-copyright-plugin
1.0.1.description:
This plugin simply adds a copyright notice to the bottom of every post on your WordPress site.

Example: (c) Copyright (the year the post was made), (the author), All Rights Reserved. Written For: (the name of your blog)

More features, like custom text, coming soon.
